column1: e mpe ntho ena ha ejewe
utlatla hontjwetsa mantsiboya hore na ausi wahao ke mang
ha se ausi wahao mami ke mme wahao
ure ausi ntsoaki aphehe dikhobe hamonate
ee ska tsela ka metsi ana untseuathunthetsa ka dintho tsena
ache ntho e teng ka mona enkhang
ke eng ntho ee ka moo
ee tsamaya he ka koloi yahao
jwetsa mami useule moholo useutseba hoqhoba koloi ham
tsamaya hojwetsa mme mamello ubatla tee
u na le tsimo kapa una le poone
oo ke tsimo le poone yahao
ure nna kebate wena ha uarate hobata
ee ska tlweba jwalo ka ntate wahao anwile jwala tjena
lesheleshele lee kenekeleetsetsa wena kapa nna
mami oabotsa hore na ke eng ntho ee
ontseaubotsa hore na ntate wahao ke mang
mula mohale le hlobohang le mololo
jwetsa ausi jwetsa mme mamello hore ketsuba peipe
ha se yo ha se yo sebalehile
nka senqaqana ke sena unonose mahlobohang
tsamaya jwetsa mme mamello amphe pompong
tloo retloetsa le mohale ke enwa
he banna moshana enwa waka oseale moholo
